saveWorkplace.js: backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'workplace', method: 'save', params: mem.workplace}).then((r)=>{mem.workplace.id=r.id; context.modified = false; setTaskTitle(`${_('Workplace')} ${mem.workplace.code}`);})

action.js: const newId=uuidv4(); context.newItem = {id: newId, path: context.selectedItem?.path?.slice(0,context.selectedItem?.path.length-1)?.concat(newId)||[newId], name: `${_('Menu item')} ${mem.menu.length+1}`}
frontend.dialog({object: 'workplace', form: 'editMenuItemDialog', mem: context.newItem, params: {currentItem: context.selectedItem}})
frontend.dialog({object: 'workplace', form: 'editMenuItemDialog', mem: context.newItem, params: {currentItem: context.selectedItem}})

deleteItem.js: const k= context.selectedItem.path.join(','); mem.menu = mem.menu.reduce((a,v)=>{if(k!=v.path.slice(0,context.selectedItem.path.length).join(','))a.push(v); return a;}, []); context.selectedItem=null;

script.py:
from django.db import transaction
from django.conf import settings
from beflex.workplace.models import Workplace

with transaction.atomic(using=settings.APPS_DB[Workplace._meta.app_label]):
    workplace = Workplace.objects.get(id=parameters.get('id')) 
    Workplace.objects.filter(code=workplace.code).delete()
    workplace.delete()
